headline: BTIG Remains Positive on NextEra Energy (NEE), Highlighting its “Premier Generation Development Platform”
summary: NextEra Energy, Inc. (NYSE:NEE) is one of the best high-growth utility stocks to buy. It is an energy company in North America that generates, transmits, and distributes electricity, with a portfolio comprising wind, solar, nuclear, natural gas, and other clean energy sources.
